Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Pulaski
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Pulaski, Grand, Kostner, and Division due to, street blockage at Division/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Pulaski, Grand, Kostner, and Division due to, street blockage at Division/Pulaski.

Allow extra travel time.
